attributes.action: SAVE OUR ONLY YOUTH CENTRE IN THE LONDON BOROUGH OF EALING.
attributes.background:
Stop the demolishment of our Youth Centre to help in the aid of lowering knife and gun crime in the borough of Ealing. This is a great place for the youth to socialise in a secure location with the aid of our MET police.

Youth and Connexions Service for Young People
Southall
UB1 3HT

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local youth centres are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for existing and new youth clubs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610248
